archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Monitor and Analyze Resource Performance Reports, and Identify Issues
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Review the resource performance management operational report prepared by resource performance management processes.

properties.value: â€¢ Monitoring and analyzing the resource instance analyses produced by the Resource Performance Management processes to identify problems that may be applicable to the resource infrastructure as a whole; In order to increase enterprise agility this may be done in near real-time.
